changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE messages ( id BIGSERIAL PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, text VARCHAR(2000), created TIMESTAMP, person_id BIGINT, room_id BIGINT, FOREIGN KEY (person_id) REFERENCES persons (id), FOREIGN KEY (room_id) REFERENCES rooms (id) );
